title: Drawing, "Vase of Flowers", 1953
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on off-white wove notebook paper, edge perforated and torn
signed: In pen and black ink, center right: Kaufmann - 1953
description: Vertical rectangle of an orange vase with flowers on thin stalks that rests on a grey platform against a ground laid out in squares in perspective.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Vase of Flowers", 1953. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on off-white wove notebook paper, edge perforated and torn. 1960-129-2.
